name: Just skill shooter 3: 2d edition
description:
Try on the role of a shooter who opposes the whole world. You will be attacked by hordes of enemies, from whom you will have to shoot back with different weapons. The grenade launcher with its missiles will reduce the number of your enemies pretty quickly. The machine is always full of bullets. Although the shotgun does a lot of damage, it takes a long time to recharge. Enemies come in different types, some have a large supply of health, some throw boxes, others create small copies of themselves after death. Be careful and you will win!

  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Many enemies
  • Interesting gameplay
